techmeme.title: Apple, Nvidia, Alphabet, Amazon, Meta, and Microsoft stocks led a tech stock sell-off amid US recession fears; AAPL drops 5%, NVDA drops 7%+, and MSFT drops ~4% (Aditya Soni/Reuters)
Investor letter: Elliott Management says megacap tech stocks, particularly Nvidia, were in "bubble land", and AI is "overhyped" and "not ready for prime time" (Financial Times)
An analysis of 200K+ English-language AI conversations: 21% of people use chatbots for creative writing, 18% for homework help, 17% for search, and 15% for work (Washington Post)
The UK says "there's no justification" for Elon Musk saying that "civil war is inevitable", and calls on social media companies to moderate more misinformation (Alex Wickham/Bloomberg)
Silicon Valley's Trump supporters are making the same mistake as all powerful people who back authoritarians: they can't control him and he won't keep promises (Michael Moritz/Financial Times)
